Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by: Father Darrell A. DaCosta, St. Paul the Apostle, 98-16 55th Avenue, Corona, NY 11368.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Sears.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by: 
Father Darrell A. DaCosta, St. Paul the Apostle, 98-16 55th Avenue, Corona, N.Y. 11368.

Council Member Sears moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes

Land Use Call-Ups

By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Katz
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application nos. C 080407 PCM, C 080408 PPM and C 080409 ZSM and shall be subject to Council review.  These items are related Uniform Land Use Procedure Application no. N 080406 ZRM
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmark, 555 West Street/820 Washington Street, Manhattan (C080407PCM)

Items.Title:
By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Katz
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application nos. C 060440 MMM, C 060333 ZSM and C 070171 ZSM  and shall be subject to Council review.  These items are related Uniform Land Use Procedure Application no. N 070145 ZRM.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Hospital for Special Surgery, Manhattan (C060440MMM)

Items.Title:
By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Katz
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d(b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application no. C 060466 MMQ, an amendment to the City Map, shall be subject to Council review.  This application is related to application no. C 060467 ZMQ that is subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, City Map Changes (C060466MMQ)

INTRODUCTION AND READING OF BILLS
Resolution calling upon the President of the United States and Congress to develop a comprehensive national approach to combating HIV/AIDS, including prevention, education and treatment strategies.

Items.MatterName: Develop a comprehensive national approach to combating HIV/AIDS, including prevention, education and treatment strategies.

Items.MatterName: Penal Law to increase penalties for crimes relating to making graffiti and possession of graffiti instruments. (A.10294)

Items.MatterName: Zoning Reso., Special Hudson Yards District, Manhattan (N080184(A)ZRM)

Items.MinutesNote: At this point the Speaker (Council Member Quinn) made the following annoucements:

Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Quinn), the Clerk of the Council adjourned to meet again on Wednesday, September 24, 2008.

HECTOR L. DIAZ, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council
